title: Vineta BT
content: Hello, I’m a graphic design student working on a typography assignment that requires me to research the font Vineta. I’m having a hard time finding information and examples of this font. If anyone has anything, that would be wonderful! Thanks.
author: mgamache

comments.content:
Hmmm... You read the entry at MyFonts? Not much.

It’s a VGC font, so have a look at this thread, and follow leads from there?  
 [http://typophile.com/node/8335](http://web.archive.org/web/20091008034528/http:/typophile.com/node/8335 "http://typophile.com/node/8335")

You might want to look at it in the context of other Clarendons.
Yeah, I’ll check that out. Thanks for the input!
